name: HD Zombie Skateboarder High School - For Kids! Life On The Run Surviving The Fire!
name_original: HD Zombie Skateboarder High School - For Kids! Life On The Run Surviving The Fire!
description:
■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□
» FULL VERSION! » NO ADVERTS! » NO IN APP PURCHASES!
■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□

What do you need for school? BRAINS!!! MMMM…. BRAINS!!

Collect BRAINS and get to school fast! Outrun the flames - you can see how close they are at the bottom of the screen! :-)

But don't let the flames from the burning buildings catch up with you or game over... just skate, skate, skate!!

Choose different zombie characters! Complete levels collecting as many brains (mmmm... brains....) as you can!

GAME FEATURES:

‣ FUN APP WHICH IS GREAT FOR ALL AGES!
‣ Cool graphics!
‣ Funny and evil Zombies!
‣ SPOOKY MUSIC!
‣ 100% PURE SKATEBOARDING FUN FUN FUN!!!!

This version is especially made for HD iPad displays!

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
